short_summary: Supply of fresh fruits and vegetables for Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional  Service of Canada and Department of National Defense for Quebec only
description: The term shall usually be for a period of 3 months, during which, on a interim basis, a Standing Offer Contract shall be established for the acquisition of fresh fruits and vegetables for Fisheries and  Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada and the Department of National Defense, under the term of this Contract. Fresh fruits and  vegetables shall only be purchased locally in Quebec. As detailed in Annex A, the list of specifications for the fruits and  vegetables  included in this Standing Offer Contract shall likely be found within the following documentation:
